ygData.subject: Re: Evil Eye Bags
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Something to add, based on my preliminary tests - Chains will override all (?) other movement spells, but the previous spells icon remains on the screen,
ygData.messageBody:
--- Alexis Muhly <acmuhly@...> wrote:
> From: "Alexis Muhly" <acmuhly@...>
>
> This plate is so heavy I'd think I'd benefit greatly from a bag of sewn
> evil eyes for my loot and weapons.. Can someone give me a rough estimate of
> what these run in plat?
>
> Thanks
>
> Kagami
>


Something to add, based on my preliminary tests - Chains will override
all (?) other movement spells, but the previous spells icon remains on the
screen, which means until it is dispelled/ends/etc, you can't selo, only
move
at normal speed. I didn't test this with all the spells, but its definately
a case
of removing a snare with chains - the snare icon remains, and selos has no
effect...

-Lohengrin


>
> Ok, after a bit of testing, here's how it seems to work:
>
> Root overrides SoW
> Chain overrides Root
> Accelerando overrides Chain
> SoW overrides Accelerando
> Root overrides Accelerado
> Chain overrides Accelerando
>
> Accelerando does not override SoW
> Accelerando does not override Root
>
> And someone else reported here that Chain overrides SoW, which
> I didn't get to test.
>
> (I hope I remembered all that right.)
>

I am told they are 300 plat or so on Mithaniel Marr. I bought/traded for one for
less than that last night but he was asking 325 plat.

By the way I hear they have a nasty bug. Apparently they sometimes disappear along
with everything in them. I plan to be cautious.



===
===Maravana Vireo of the Jus Divinum - maravana@...
===Bard of 33 Songs, Mithaniel Marr
